Title: Cross-site Scripting
Description: Cross-Site Scripting in third party library `mso/idna-convert`.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.10, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.2.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.10 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.2.1
